titles.title: Urging the Secretary of State to designate the Caucasus Emirate as a foreign terrorist organization.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.

committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 4/29/2010--Introduced. Condemns the terrorist acts carried out by the Caucasus Emirate against Russian civilians. Urges the Secretary of State to designate the Caucasus Emirate as a foreign terrorist organization.
